definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: ephod (= [[אֵפוֹד]], for which it supplies cstr. & sf. forms).

definitions.title: 1 b
definitions.body: , only [[סחֵשֶׁב אֲפֻדָּתוֹ]]Ex 28:8, Ex 39:5 the cunningly-wrought band of his ephod.
of sheathing of idol-images, [[אֲפֻדַּת מַסֵּכַתוְהָכֶָךָ]]Is 30:22 (‖[[חִפוּי פְסִילֵי כַסְפֶּ ךָ]]) cf. [[אֵפוֹר]]
